Translations.Text: yeon-ieo bonaeneun balam-eul dugo maengsehasa
bunnohan pogpung-uleul dugo maengseha myeo
meolli guleum-eul naleuneun geudeul-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
seololeul gyeoglisikyeo juneun jadeul-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
gyesileul jeonhayeo juneun jadeul-eul dugo maengsehanani
jinlileul balghigo gyeong-gohanola
sillo neohuiege yagsogdoen geosdeul-idagaogo issnola
byeoldeul-i bich-eul sangsilhago
haneul-i jjogaeeo jimyeo
sandeul-i meonjiga doeeo hwinallyeo gago
seonjijadeul-i yagsogdoen sigan-e moige doeneun ttae
igeosdeul-eun eotteon nal-eul wihayeo yuyedoeeossdeonyo
bunlyuhaneun geunal-eul wihaeseola
bunlyuhaneun geunal-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
hananim-i geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a yes seonjodeul-eul myeolmangke hago
geudeul hue saeloun sedaeleul odolog hage haess-euni
icheoleom hananim-eun joeindeul-eul dalunila
geunal jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul-e ge jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
hananim-i neohuileul changjohamae hachanh-eun jeong-aeg-eulo changjohaji anihaess deonyo
hananim-eun geu jeong-aeg-eul anjeonhan gos-e dueoss-eudoe
allyeojin gigankkajila
hananim-eun geuleohge hayeo hyeongsang eul gyeoljeonghani gajang aleumdaun neunglyeog isila
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
hananim-i geu daejileul moineun gos-eulo haji anihaessneunyo
ineun sanjawa jug-eun jadeul-eul wihaeseola
geu an-e nop-eun sandeul-eul dueo neohuiege masil dalkomhan mul-eul juji anh-assdeonyo
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
neohuiga geojis-ila haessdeon geugos eulo galaneun mal-i iss-eul geos-imyeo
se gallaeui yeongiga ssain geugos-eulo gala
geugos-eun siwonhage hal geuneuldo hwayeom-eul mag-eul geos-i eobsneun gos-ila
sillo gung-gwilgwa gat-eun keugiui bulgil-i chisos-euni
geu bulgil-eun nolan nagtaga ttwineungeosgwa gatnola
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
geunal-eun geudeul-i eotteon maldo halsu eobsneun nal-i doel geos-imyeo
geudeul-egeneun eotteohan byeonmyeongdo heolagdoeji anihani
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
geunal-eun bunlyuleul haneun nal-i doel geos-imyeo hananim-eun neohui moduwa neo hui ijeon-ui modeun jadeul-eul hamkke moi ge halini
neohuiga gyelyag-ina eummohan geos i issdamyeon na-e daehanghayeo eummoha yeo bola
geunal-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan jadeul ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
